languages.text: {n}Паскаль остается неподвижен, и лишь из его вокса изливается краткая бинарная ария. Вас наполняет странная уверенность, что знак оказанного вами уважения был оценен и принят благосклонно.{/n}
{n}Pasqal remains motionless. Only a short binharic aria comes from his vox. You feel oddly confident that your gesture of respect has been appreciated and received favourably.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Паскаль остается неподвижен, и лишь из его вокса изливается краткая бинарная ария. Вас наполняет странная уверенность, что знак оказанного вами уважения был оценен и принят благосклонно.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal remains motionless. Only a short binary aria pours out of his vox. You feel oddly confident that your gesture of respect has been appreciated and received favourably.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルは動かずじっとしている。短いビンハリックの讃美歌がそのヴォクスからただ流れる。不思議なことに、あなたが敬意を示したことに感謝し、好意的に受け止めてもらえているのだと強く感じる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal remains motionless. Only a short binharic aria comes from his vox. You feel oddly confident that your gesture of respect has been appreciated and received favourably.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは動かずじっとしている。短いビンハリックの讃美歌がそのヴォクスからただ流れる。不思議なことに、あなたが敬意を示したことに感謝し、好意的に受け止めてもらえているのだと強く感じる。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡一动不动，只是通过音阵发出一段简短的二进制咏叹调。你心中感到了某种古怪的自信，你感觉你尊敬的态度已经得到了赞赏与认可。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal remains motionless. Only a short binharic aria comes from his vox. You feel oddly confident that your gesture of respect has been appreciated and received favourably.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡一动不动，只是通过音阵发出一段简短的二进制咏叹调。你心中感到了某种古怪的自信，你感觉你尊敬的态度已经得到了赞赏与认可。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Même si Pasqal demeure immobile, son vox diffuse une courte aria en binhaire. Vous êtes intimement {mf|convaincu|convaincue} que votre témoignage de respect a été apprécié.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal remains motionless. Only a short binharic aria comes from his vox. You feel oddly confident that your gesture of respect has been appreciated and received favourably.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Même si Pasqal demeure immobile, son vox diffuse une courte aria en binhaire. Vous êtes intimement {mf|convaincu|convaincue} que votre témoignage de respect a été apprécié.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal permanece impasible; solo se escucha un corto aria binario proveniente de su voco. Te sientes extrañamente segur{mf|o|a} de que ha apreciado y recibido favorablemente tu gesto de respeto.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal remains motionless. Only a short binharic aria comes from his vox. You feel oddly confident that your gesture of respect has been appreciated and received favourably.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal permanece impasible; solo se escucha un corto aria binario proveniente de su voco. Te sientes extrañamente segur{mf|o|a} de que ha apreciado y recibido favorablemente tu gesto de respeto.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal bleibt reglos. Aus seinem Vox ertönt nur eine kurze binhäre Arie. Du spürst eine eigenartige Sicherheit, dass deine Geste des Respekts dankbar und wohlwollend aufgenommen wurde.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal remains motionless. Only a short binharic aria comes from his vox. You feel oddly confident that your gesture of respect has been appreciated and received favourably.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal bleibt reglos. Aus seinem Vox ertönt nur eine kurze binhäre Arie. Du spürst eine eigenartige Sicherheit, dass deine Geste des Respekts dankbar und wohlwollend aufgenommen wurde.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, hareketsiz kalmayı sürdürüyor. Voksundan yalnızca kısa bir ikilidil arya çıkıyor. Saygılı hareketinin takdir görüp olumlu karşılandığına nedense epey eminsin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal remains motionless. Only a short binharic aria comes from his vox. You feel oddly confident that your gesture of respect has been appreciated and received favourably.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal hareketsiz kalmayı sürdürüyor. Voksundan yalnızca kısa bir ikilidil arya çıkıyor. Saygılı hareketinin takdir gördüğüne ve olumlu karşılandığına tuhaf derecede eminsin.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
